NAME: power_matrix PURPOSE: Constructs an array of n x n matrices such that the (i,j)th element of the kth matrix is: i j M(i,j,k) = p(k) q(k) CATEGORY: UTIL CALLING SEQUENCE: result = power_matrix(p, q, n) ARGUMENTS: INPUT: p: An input array of k elements q: An input array of k elements n: Dimension of 2d matrix OUTPUT: NONE KEYWORDS: NONE RETURN: The power_matrix as described above.
